Name: Planet Bounce
About the game: Planet Bounce is an action packed arcade-style space game. Fight against friends and the computer. Bounce and battle through this uniquely engineered universe. Multiplayer Ship Combat Orbit solar systems, attacking opponents, in this exciting 2D space combat game. Fight to take over, or even destroy, entire systems and blow them into space dust. Exciting Singleplayer Campaigns Explore uncharted galaxies in extensive campaigns. Find and battle alien races and play unique game modes as you fight to make humanity safe. Conquer fleets of enemy ships, or casually engage an easy AI. Grow through the Ranks Unlock weapons, maps and powerful new ships as you grow in rank. Complete levels and gain powerful bonuses and specialties to destroy your enemies. Unlock hundreds of bonuses.
